title: UN chief expresses condolences following mass shooting at Oregon college (UN - United Nations)
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 2 October 2015 - Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon voiced his deep sadness in the wake of the mass shooting that took place yesterday at a college in the state of Oregon in the United States . 'He conveys his
